title: Animated RGB LED Party Speakers
description: A set of 6 different party speakers with dazzling RGB LED animations to liven up any party scene. Included are a selection of mini speakers (also RGB), retail boxes for each speaker and a selection of accessories.
longDescription:
A selection of RGB speakers that can add some visual flare to your projects. They are mostly wireless speakers that have colorful animated lights that can be changed according to your needs. You can place them in your virtual party, event or any occasions where you want to add a festive atmosphere. Accessories like plugs, cables, phones and tablets you can use to accompany your speakers. You can use the cables to visually connect speakers to a device or to each other. The retail boxes included for each speaker can be used in retail scenes or as clutter to accompany the speaker they "contained".


Showcase Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eqs50PxhezI&ab_channel=SmirkyDragon



Giant Dual 10" Speaker:

  • Features two 10 inch subwoofers, four mids, four tweeters and four height/ surround drivers
  • Fully rigged DJ Deck with skeleton for animation
  • Rigged woofers that can animated with several sample animations
  • Detachable design
  • A dot matrix display that can be changed in the material instance
  • Two strobe lights that can be easily disabled in the material instance
  • 10 different zones for color customization in the material instance
  • Great for a big party, place in a games room, basement, or kid's room


The Giant 18" Hanging or Floor Standing Speaker:

  • Features an 18 inch subwoofer, and either two or four mid/ high cabinets in a column line array
  • The subwoofer is rigged and can be animated with several sample animations
  • Four strobe lights that can be easily disabled in the material instance
  • Eight different zones for color customization in the material instance
  • Great for a huge party or an extravagant entertainment room


Dual 6" Speaker:

  • Features two 6 inch woofers and two tweeters
  • A 14 segment display that can be changed in the material instance
  • A separate handle to have extend or retracted
  • Nine different zones for color customization in the material instance
  • Great to have at a party, social gatherings indoors or outdoors or a kid's room


Dual 4" Speaker:

  • Features two 4 inch woofers and two tweeters
  • 11 different zones for color customization in the material instance
  • Great to have at a small party, a social gathering indoors or outdoors or a kid's room


Cheap 15" Speaker:

  • Features a 15 inch metallic woofer and piezo tweeter
  • A 7 segment display that can be changed in the material instance
  • Rigged with a handle that can extend and retract with physics enabled
  • Five different zones for color customization in the material instance
  • Comes with a remote control
  • Great for a kid's room or a low budget party setting
  • Includes a separate woofer model for use in your own cabinet model (355.6mm 14inch 32 vertices)


Cheap 10" Speaker and Cheap Dual 10" Speaker:

  • Features either one or two 10 inch metallic woofers and two piezo tweeters
  • A 7 segment display that can be changed in the material instance
  • Four different zones for color customization in the material instance
  • Great for a kid's room or a low budget party setting
  • Includes a separate woofer model for use in your own cabinet model (241.3mm 9.5inch 32 vertices)


Retail boxes:

  • Each speaker comes with a cardboard box or crate that's colorful and matches the theme of each speaker


Accessories:

  • 6 and 7 inch smartphone to accompany speakers
  • 11 and 14 inch tablet computers to accompany speakers
  • A USB flash drive to plug into the speakers
  • The plugs included to use with the Spline Mesh Actor
  • Headphone Jack
  • Quarter Inch Jack
  • Microphone
  • Power Plug
  • Power Wall Plug
  • Usb C
  • The Spline Mesh Actor can be used to easily create cables to visually connect devices together, select a plug to use as start and end mesh to make a cable


Please read this warning before purchasing or using this product.

This product contains strobe lights and other visual effects that may cause seizures or other adverse reactions in some people. These effects include, but are not limited to, rapid flashes, alternating patterns, high contrast colors, and moving images.


Even if you do not have a history of epilepsy or seizures, you may still be at risk of experiencing a seizure or other symptoms due to photosensitivity. These symptoms include headaches, dizziness, nausea, eye strain, blurred vision, and loss of consciousness. Some people may also experience emotional or behavioral changes after exposure to flashing or flickering lights.


If you are unsure whether you are photosensitive or not, please consult your doctor before using this product. If you experience any of the above symptoms while using this product, stop immediately and seek medical attention.

By purchasing or using this product, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this warning and that you assume all risks associated with photosensitivity. The developer of this product is not liable for any damages or injuries caused by the use of this product.


If you use this product in your own projects, you are responsible for forwarding this warning to the users of your projects.


(this product does not include any audio or system for audio interaction)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  A versatile set of speaker props
  •  Multiple animations and example material instances are provided to suit many scenarios
  •  The small shop scene shown in the screenshots and video is provided to help select or experiment with the speaker's look
  • A guide to making the LED animations is provided on the roof of the showcase scene to help you get started making custom animations for the provided speaker models
  • The LED animation technique used is lightweight and easy to run
  • Minimum mesh geometry is used in each model, with fully set up LOD levels
  • Every material has several resolutions to choose from, most objects have the lowest resolution material applied by default, if you need to get closer then simply apply a higher resolution material

Number of Unique Meshes: 59

Collision: Yes: automatically generated

Vertex Count: 24 to 11656

LODs: Yes (Custom LODs (except GiantDual10 uses generated LODs))

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 193

Number of Textures: 352

Texture Resolutions: 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The provided showcase scene is just for demonstration purposes only and is not intended for production use. Everything inside the "ShowcaseScene" folder is just for demonstration and may also be included in other published products to showcase them.
